thread.title: Ajit Agarkar trolled on Twitter after Dhoni's match-winning inning against South Africa
thread.title_full: Ajit Agarkar trolled on Twitter after Dhoni's match-winning inning against South Africa

title: Ajit Agarkar trolled on Twitter after Dhoni's match-winning inning against South Africa
text:
You Are Here : Home » Sports » Cricket » Ajit Agarkar trolled on Twitter after Dhoni's match-winning inning against South Africa Ajit Agarkar trolled on Twitter after Dhoni's match-winning inning against South Africa IndiaTV Sports Desk [ Updated 14 Oct 2015, 21:01:28 ] India wins toss, decides to bat against South Africa in second ODI 
New Delhi: Former cricketer Ajit Agarkar become the victim of Twitter trolling after Indian captain MS Dhoni scored 92 runs match winning inning against South Africa in the second ODI match today. 
Notably, the former Indian pacer had questioned Dhoni's place in the team before the start of the ODI series against the Proteas. 
"The selectors need to have a closer look at what MS Dhoni is doing, not just as captain, but as a player as well," Agarkar was quoted as saying by 'ESPNcricinfo' on Friday. 
He even got a certain backing after India lost the first ODI. Read Also: Ind vs SA: Vintage Dhoni rescues with unbeaten 92, takes India to 247/9 
But, today as Dhoni came back to action and played a brilliant innings of 92 runs, Ajit Agarkar had no sparing from the MSD fans. 
While Twitter flooded with praises for Dhoni for saving India from the embarrassment after Raina, Rohit and Virat failed to score runs, the medium pacer was thrash for his harsh words against the captain cool. 
Here are some tweets:
